name: I Am_
description:
A short story about a half-human with a computer head who wakes up with memory loss and tries to figure out what happened to him.

This game is inspired by a poem written by John Clare, which describes the emptiness of his life and identity he felt during his asylum year.

**Control**

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move the curse

**Tips**

  • In-game hints are available via the trigger on the left room's window.
  • I actually set the cursor position next to the required character. So if you have no idea about which character to use, just follow the cursor!
  • New events occur when the recovery process runs to 8%, 12%, 15%.
